Uses of Class
coupon.sys.core.exceptions.CouponSystemException

  • Packages that use CouponSystemException 
    Package Description
    coupon.sys.core.connection
    This package handle connection in the system.
    coupon.sys.core.coupon.system
    This package handle one singelton class which provides one instance of the system.
    coupon.sys.core.dao
    This pachage defines all the Dao (Data Access Object) intefaces for the coupon system.
    coupon.sys.core.dao.db
    This package holds a concrete classes - implementations of all the methods of the abstract classes.
    coupon.sys.core.facade
    This package contains 1 abstract class called "Client Facade" and 3 concrete classes that should have implemented the login method in the ClientFacade class.
    Since the login method was implemented in CompanyDaoDb and in the CustomerDaoDb this class is irrelevant
    coupon.sys.core.sub.processes
    This package has one class that responsibale for the Coupon Expiration thread
    coupon.sys.mainTest
    This package contains collaborative tests.
    It has 7 threads that run together and test all the methods and the connection pool.
    It has:
    1.

      This method closes all connections in the connection pool.

      Methods in coupon.sys.core.dao that throw CouponSystemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean CompanyDao.checkDbExistence(Company company)
      This method checks if a company with the same name already exists in the DB.
      boolean CouponDao.checkDbExistence(Coupon coupon)
      This method checks if a coupon with the same title already exists in the DB.
      boolean CustomerDao.checkDbExistence(Customer customer)
      This method checks if a customer with the same name already exists in the DB.
      void CompanyDao.createCompany(Company company)
      This method insert a new company into the data base (Company table) Before the method insert the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
      void CompanyDao.createCompanyCouponRecord(long comp_id, long coupon_id)
      This method insert a record into Company Coupon table every time a company creates a new coupon Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
      void CouponDao.createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      This method insert a new coupon into the data base (Coupon table) Before the method insert the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
      void CustomerDao.createCustomer(Customer customer)
      This method insert a new customer into the data base (Customer table) Before the method insert the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
      void CustomerDao.createCustomerCouponRecord(long cust_id, long coupon_id)
      This method insert a record into Customer Coupon table every time a customer purchase a new coupon Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.

      This method returns a collection of all the companies.

      This method returns a collection of all the customers.

      This method activate the createCompany at the companyDaoDB class.

      This method activate the createCustomer at the customerDaoDB class.

      This method activate the getAllCustomers method at customerDaoDB class.
